fulltext:
824f76bcbc8d11e1a404080027e73ea2dcf6c3290e944b38a24abab77a1d53e1;2018-11-15T16:39:19Z;toolService;toolService:tool;UIMA/U-Compare OpenNLP Tokenizer;This is a UIMA wrapper for the OpenNLP Tokenizer tool. It splits English sentences into individual tokens. The tool forms part of the in-built library of components provided with the U-Compare platform (see separate META-SHARE record)  for building and evaluating text mining workflows. The U-Compare Workbench (see separate META-SHARE record), provides a graphical drag-and drop interface for the rapid creation of workflows. 
;2013-02-15
name: aa44b401-ce67-54ed-bc94-2a9b95db1ae8
notes: This is a UIMA wrapper for the OpenNLP Tokenizer tool. It splits English sentences into individual tokens. The tool forms part of the in-built library of components provided with the U-Compare platform (see separate META-SHARE record)  for building and evaluating text mining workflows. The U-Compare Workbench (see separate META-SHARE record), provides a graphical drag-and drop interface for the rapid creation of workflows.
title: UIMA/U-Compare OpenNLP Tokenizer
